type_definition.name: Topic
type_definition.description: The "Topic" type describes an "article like" entity.

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: A "Topic"s title.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: A "Topic"s description.

attribute.name: keywords
attribute.description: Holds a topic's "synonyms" (text-list)attribute.

attribute.name: categories
attribute.description: A "Topic"s category references.

attribute.name: voting_stats
attribute.description: Keeps track of the votes a topic has received.

attribute.name: location
attribute.description: Holds an topic's location.

attribute.name: meta
attribute.description: Holds a set of generic attributes.

attribute.name: workflow_ticket
attribute.description: Holds the current workflow state.

embed_definition.name: Location
embed_definition.description: A "Location" describes a concrete adress together with a corresponding geo-point.

attribute.name: street
attribute.description: Holds a location's street.

attribute.name: housenumber
attribute.description: Holds a location's housenumber.

attribute.name: postal_code
attribute.description: Holds a location's postal code.

attribute.name: city
attribute.description: Holds a location's city.

attribute.name: lon
attribute.description: Holds a location's longitude value.

attribute.name: lat
attribute.description: Holds a location's latitude value.

embed_definition.name: VotingStats
embed_definition.description: Embeds information on the number of votes, a max(global) score and average voting.

attribute.name: average_score
attribute.description: Holds an average voting score ('global score' / 'number of votes').

attribute.name: global_score
attribute.description: Holds the sum of all votings that have taken place.

attribute.name: voting_count
attribute.description: Holds the number of votes that have taken place.

embed_definition.name: WorkflowTicket
embed_definition.description: A "WorkflowTicket" reflects the current state of an document's workflow.

attribute.name: workflow_name
attribute.description: Holds the name of the related workflow.

attribute.name: workflow_step
attribute.description: Holds the current step's name, being the cursor for the workflow execution.

attribute.name: owner
attribute.description: Holds the name of the user currently owning the item.

attribute.name: blocked
attribute.description: Tells whether we are currently open to workflow executions or not.

attribute.name: step_counts
attribute.description: Tracks the number of executions of workflow steps.

attribute.name: wait_until
attribute.description: Holds a iso8601 date at which the workflow will be continued.

attribute.name: last_result
attribute.description: Holds the result of the latest workflow execution.

embed_definition.name: PluginResult
embed_definition.description: A "PluginResult" reflects the result of the latest workflow execution.

attribute.name: state
attribute.description: Holds a success/error code representing a certain state.

attribute.name: gate
attribute.description: Holds the name of the gate to use when proceeding.

attribute.name: message
attribute.description: Holds an optional message that accompanies the state code.
